participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, Jake enjoys outdoor activities and has a zest for life.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i am a huge coffee lover. i don't drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker.
